name: Sunroof Shootout
description:
You can either steer or shoot. Not both.

Be careful! Your car won't stop moving because you stopped steering. Your car will continue to move until you stop shooting and take the wheel again. Hitting potholes or other cars will send you sliding.

Try to drive as far as possible before you crash into one of the guardrails!

Controls:

  • Mouse - Aim and Steer
  • M - Mute
  • Left Click / S (hold) - Start Shooting
